    EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
    SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM

        BULK ''https://synapseabduladls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxidata/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',

        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) AS [result]'


--Few datatypes are bigints on very small numbers we need to change that.
--We can use select MAX(LEN()) to get the length of particular column


--For explicitly changing the datatypes we shouls use with clause

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseabduladls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxidata/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)   
        )AS [result]



    



    -- handling headerless data and also naming the coumns with ORDINAL Position.
    SELECT
    *
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseabduladls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxidata/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT 1,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) 3
        )
    AS [result]




CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery

use nyc_taxi_discovery

 -- Fixing Column names
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseabduladls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxidata/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        Locationid SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4   
        )AS [result]





-- using Extenal Data sources for URL
    CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
    WITH(
        LOCATION = 'https://synapseabduladls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxidata/raw/'
    )

    SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH(
        Locationid SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4   
        )AS [result]
